input_str:
In a new series on GuinnessWorldRecords.com, we profile some of the most inspiring stories of commitment, courage and and dedication behind some of our most extraordinary titles. This week we're placing the spotlight on a real life miracle on ice.

Mark Sertich loves the sport of ice hockey. Always has. Always will. He says it’s a wonderful opportunity to be with a great bunch of friends.



Each week, Mark and his buddies from Duluth, Minnesota, USA gather to play three games against an opposing team
